boone.training

Class HopfieldDeltaTrainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • boone.Trainer
      • boone.training.HopfieldDeltaTrainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Storable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class HopfieldDeltaTrainer
extends Trainer
    Trainer for Hopfield networks using the delta learning rule.
    Version:

      • train

        public void train(java.util.List<java.lang.Double> input,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.Double> target)
        Performs training of the Hopfield network. First innervates the network and then trains a single neuron selected at random using the delta rule. For training of this neuron (weights and biases) of all other neurons are assigned the correct output values for a pattern, so the neuron being trained is adapting to the correct values of a pattern.
        Specified by:
        train in class Trainer
        Parameters:
        input - an input pattern
        target - a target pattern
